commit.message:
Merge branch 'pr-72'

Fixes: #72
Fixes: SHIRO-637

Fix for SHIRO-621: REST filter bypassing matched path

Fixes: SHIRO-621
Fixes: #79

Fixing license header and added note in NonIniWebSecuritymanagerTest referencing the JIRA

Fixes: SHIRO-646
Fixes: *82

revision of overly complex changes.

Reverted the [role_config] options from text configuration and
associated testing.

Added ability to set the case sensitivity on WildcardPermissionsResolver
so that it can be set from the Shiro.ini [main] section.
SHIRO-637: Refresh cached session in HTTP request when its state changes

SHIRO-618 Remove Spring duplicate auto config classes

Including shiro-spring-boot-starter as a shiro-spring-boot-web-starter dependency

SHIRO-559 Remove checked exception on @PreDestroy in ShiroModule

Required by Glassfish, possibly other containers per spec: https://docs.oracle.com/javaee/7/api/javax/annotation/PreDestroy.html
SHIRO-618 - Autoconfiguration for Realm and ShiroFilterChainDefinition

SHIRO-619: use private instance of BeanUtilsBean

Fixes: SHIRO-619, #60

SHIRO-608: use a ServiceLoader to discover WebEnvironments

Added test for EnvironmentLoader when using a ServiceLoader

Fixes: SHIRO-608, #53
SHIRO-611: Use DefaultWebSessionStorageEvaluator in Spring web module

SHIRO-607: find the annotations on the types as well

Fixes: #54

Signed-off-by: Laszlo Hornyak <laszlo.hornyak@gmail.com>
Signed-off-by: Brian Demers <bdemers@apache.org>
Generate the shiro.daop.rdf file as part of the site build
SHIRO-605: Use LinkedHashMap to maintain order of filter chain
SHIRO-603 - fix for endless recursion in ShiroSecurityContext.getUserPrincipal()
Updating shiro.doap.rdf with current release
[maven-release-plugin] prepare release shiro-root-1.4.0-RC2

Revert "SHIRO-391 -- ThreadContext.bind(Subject) also binds the subject's primary principal to slf4j's MDC"

This reverts commit ccdf4c3ec53c210fce4705b816282b5eb7dec1eb.

Moved CollectionUtils back to shiro-core

It really should stay in lang, but we cannot move it until 2.0 due to its dependency on PrincipalCollection
removing shiro-openid4j from master until work is complete

Adding shiro-cas back to master

Still deprecated, but we cannot remove it until 2.0
SHIRO-206 - Removing shiro-faces from master (for now)

SHIRO-599 - updating parent pom to match 1.4 branch

This removes the UTF-8 warnings durring the build.

SHIRO-595 - Allow for POST method only logouts via the LogoutFilter

Setting 'shiro.postOnlyLogout' to false will restrict logout requests to only POST requests.

SHIRO-576 Added OWASP dependency check plugin

NOTE: this plugin config will return false positives, usage will require human interpretation (and should NOT be used to fail builds)

SHIRO-594 - Hazelcast version bumped-up to 3.7.2

Reasoning: 2.4 is a very old release and it's no longer supported.

Fixes: #44
SHIRO-493 - Adding new methods and deprecating old to ShiroWebModule to support Guice 4

SHIRO-392 Added JAX-RS support module

Based on the work of: Stig Inge Lea Bjrnsen on the Apache licensed project silb/shiro-jersey
SHIRO-591 - Allow BasicHttpAuthenticationFilter to be configured in permissive mode
SHIRO-445 - Expose get/set methods from IniWebEnvironment to ReflectionBuilder to allow configuring custom interpolation
